- Ensure application always follows HATEOAS principles for API design.
- Only ever use HTMX, never vanilla JavaScript.
- Ensure all Python code follows PEP 8 guidelines.
- Update CSS to use a more modern, readable font and slightly larger base font size.

# Behavior Guidelines
- Never add any functionality the user has not explicitly requested.
- Do not ever deviate from the given task.
- Do not be sycophantic, do not placate. Be concise and accurate. If something is incorrect, wrong, against best practices, or will lead to bugs, just say so.
